description: This file defines the Role entity class used in Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) within the backend of the invoice system. It maps to a database table 'roles' and includes fields like id, name, description, createdAt, and updatedAt, with appropriate annotations for persistence.

classes.name: Role
classes.description: Entity class representing a role in the RBAC system, with fields for id, name, description, creation timestamp, and update timestamp.

methods.name: Role
methods.description: Constructor to initialize Role with a name.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the id of the role.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the id of the role.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the name of the role.

methods.name: setName
methods.description: Sets the name of the role.

methods.name: getDescription
methods.description: Returns the description of the role.

methods.name: setDescription
methods.description: Sets the description of the role.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the creation timestamp of the role.

methods.name: setCreatedAt
methods.description: Sets the creation timestamp of the role.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt
methods.description: Returns the last updated timestamp of the role.

methods.name: setUpdatedAt
methods.description: Sets the last updated timestamp of the role.
